vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
AirDropContract.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- contract_address.call(id,msg.sender,tos[i],vs[i]) (0xa1fceeff3acc57d257b917e30c4df661401d6431.sol#22)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in 0xa1fceeff3acc57d257b917e30c4df661401d6431.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (0xa1fceeff3acc57d257b917e30c4df661401d6431.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter 'contract_address' of AirDropContract.transfer (0xa1fceeff3acc57d257b917e30c4df661401d6431.sol#13) is not in mixedCase
